Title: Pay your debts off for cents on the dollar.

Author: piers
Title: Ask n.yc: Can anyone recommend a good tutorial for iptables?

Author: daniel-cussen
Content:
From a biological standpoint, an animal is genetically designed to only do things that make it a successful animal (with lots of surviving babies). This can include certain amounts of sleeping and socializing. Happiness is a positive reinforcement for doing the right things (like eating and sleeping).

Though humans are more complex and different, it may not be too far-fetched to say that everything we do is work, in some form or another. If Max Levchin might not be happy doing anything else, that makes a lot of sense.

Author: gscott
Content: I went on the low side on the numbers, not sure if maybe I should be more optimistic or stay with easy to reach.

Author: myoung8
Content:
Do you guys think this technology will get to the point where we can track all of our earthly possessions?

I think that day will come, but it will be RFID, not GPS, that is the core enabling technology.
